SEARCH
Package com.straxov.city

Class City

java.lang.Object
com.straxov.city.City
public class City extends Object
Singleton class representing the city, containing all banks, workers, and spenders. Responsible for initializing and providing access to all city entities.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Bank>
    getBanks()
    Gets the list of all banks in the city.
    static City
    getInstance()
    Returns the singleton instance of the city using double-checked locking pattern.
    List<Spender>
    getSpenders()
    Gets the list of all spenders in the city.
    int
    getTotalMoney()
    Calculates the total amount of money in circulation in the city.
    List<Worker>
    getWorkers()
    Gets the list of all workers in the city.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static City getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the city using double-checked locking pattern.
      Returns:
      the singleton City instance

    • getTotalMoney

      public int getTotalMoney()
      Calculates the total amount of money in circulation in the city. Includes money from all banks, workers and spenders.
      Returns:
      total money amount in the city
